name: Superheavy Samurai Fist
desc: During your Battle Phase, if a "Superheavy Samurai" monster you controlled destroyed an opponent's monster by battle, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon using this card you control. If you have no Spell/Traps in your GY and this card is in your GY: You can target 1 "Superheavy Samurai" Synchro Monster you control; you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Superheavy Samurai" monsters, also reduce the targeted monster's Level by 1, and if you do, Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Superheavy Samurai Fist" once per turn.
